## Basic info

To make sure that we are on the same page:

* Kernel: (run `uname -a`)
* System: (NixOS: `nixos-version`, Ubuntu/Fedora: `lsb_release -a`, ...)
* Nix version: (run `nix-env --version`)
* Nixpkgs version: (run `nix-instantiate --eval '<nixpkgs>' -A lib.nixpkgsVersion`)
